# Color-Py

Color handling library written in Python.

<!-- ## Installation
<!-- **Windows:** `pip install color-py`

<!-- **Linux/macOS:** `pip3 install color-py`
-->
## Usage
```py
from color-py.Color import Color

colors = [
    new Color(0x38, 0x5d, 0xc6)
]

Color.mix(colors).toARGB()
```
